This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down Grand River and spotted a vertical object hanging in the sky. It was moving very slowly in a rotating motion, like a dreidel being spun. The object was shaped like an acorn or diamond and there were protrusions sticking out of the sides. I pulled my car over to a parking lot and the object disappeared before I could get a good look at it and take a picture of it on my cellphone. It either faded away or took off very fast.
Summary: Blue, green, red and violet colored diamond shaped object in sky.
